nodes.text: Black Spire Day was a holiday celebrated at Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu. It was to commemorate the founding of the outpost. Locals would decorate the outpost with colorful ribbons and tarps while celebrating with parades and feasts. It would occasionally end with a fireworks display.
Black Spire Day was created for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019.
